dt: {bc}a person who engages in irregular warfare especially as a member of an independent unit carrying out harassment and sabotage {dx_def}see {dxt|sabotage||2}{/dx_def}

et: Spanish {it}guerrilla{/it}, from diminutive of {it}guerra{/it} war, of Germanic origin; akin to Old High German {it}werra{/it} strife {ma}{mat|war|}{/ma}
shortdef: a person who engages in irregular warfare especially as a member of an independent unit carrying out harassment and sabotage
